author: hkesler
msg: karaf-2190, karaf-2192: this fixes the wrapper test and obr tests on faster machines, it was failing with CommandNotFoundExceptions because the features had not finished installing before the commands were being executed

author: rwhitcomb
msg: More work on PIVOT-873: "editOnMouseDown" style for TableView:  fix logic in SelectMode.NONE case
so this style works right to select the row for editing on first click.
This is a merge of revision 1446780 from branches/2.0.x to trunk.
